0.name: Hitch
0.description: Run 5 yards, stop and turn back to QB

1.name: Flat
1.description: Release to the flat area, stay shallow

2.name: Slant
2.description: 3-step release, break sharply inside at 45 degrees

3.name: Comeback
3.description: Push vertical 15 yards, plant and come back to sideline

4.name: Curl
4.description: Push vertical 12 yards, curl back inside toward QB

5.name: Out
5.description: Push vertical 12 yards, break hard to sideline

6.name: Dig/In
6.description: Push vertical 12 yards, break sharply inside across field

7.name: Corner
7.description: Push vertical 12 yards, break to corner/pylon at 45 degrees

8.name: Post
8.description: Push vertical 12 yards, break inside toward goalpost at 45 degrees

9.name: Go/Fade
9.description: Straight vertical route, beat defender deep

drag.name: Drag
drag.description: Shallow crossing route at 3-5 yards, run across formation

seam.name: Seam
seam.description: Vertical route up the hash marks, split the safeties

wheel.name: Wheel
wheel.description: Release to flat, then turn upfield along sideline

angle.name: Angle
angle.description: Release outside, then break back inside at angle

whip.name: Whip
whip.description: Release inside, whip back outside quickly

pivot.name: Pivot
pivot.description: Short out route, pivot back inside

stick.name: Stick
stick.description: 6-yard hitch settling in zone hole, like a short curl

sail.name: Sail
sail.description: Deep out route, pushing to 18 yards before breaking out

over.name: Over
over.description: Deep crossing route at 15 yards, run all the way across

under.name: Under
under.description: Medium crossing route at 8 yards, underneath coverage

option.name: Option
option.description: Read coverage, break inside vs man or sit vs zone

post_corner.name: Post-Corner
post_corner.description: Fake post break, then break to corner

out_and_up.name: Out-and-Up
out_and_up.description: Fake out route, then go vertical

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.description: Immediate bubble behind LOS toward sideline

quick_out.name: Quick Out
quick_out.description: 3-step out route, immediate break to sideline

speed_out.name: Speed Out
speed_out.description: Fast 5-yard out, get to sideline quickly

texas.name: Texas
texas.description: RB angle route - release inside, break to flat

arrow.name: Arrow
arrow.description: RB immediate release to flat at 45-degree angle

swing.name: Swing
swing.description: RB swing to flat, get width before depth

screen.name: Screen
screen.description: Let rushers by, receive ball behind LOS with blockers

quick_game.name: Slant-Flat
quick_game.description: Horizontal stretch on flat defender. If he widens to flat, throw slant. If he jumps slant, throw flat. Simple 2-man read.

quick_game.name: Stick
quick_game.description: 3-level quick read. Stick route at 6 yards settles in zone hole. Flat underneath, corner deep. Read flat defender high to low.
quick_game.key_read: Flat defender - if he squats on stick, throw flat

quick_game.name: Quick Out
quick_game.description: Fast 3-step out to the sideline. Good vs soft coverage. Must throw with anticipation before break.
quick_game.key_read: Corner alignment - only throw if off coverage

quick_game.name: Hitch-Seam
quick_game.description: Outside hitches with seam route up the middle. Attacks cover 2 hole between safety and corner.

quick_game.name: Double Slants
quick_game.description: Two slants from same side. First slant clears, second sits behind. Excellent vs man coverage.
quick_game.key_read: LB depth - throw over or under

quick_game.name: Snag
quick_game.description: Triangle concept with corner, stick/snag, and flat. Creates 3-on-2 to one side of field.
quick_game.key_read: Corner - high/low read on flat defender

quick_game.name: Bubble Screen
quick_game.description: Immediate bubble to slot receiver. Blockers in front. Numbers game in space.

quick_game.name: Now Screen
quick_game.description: WR screen to outside receiver. OL releases to block. Quick hitter to get playmaker in space.
quick_game.key_read: DE - need to get ball out before pressure

dropback.name: Mesh
dropback.description: Two receivers cross at 5-6 yards going opposite directions. Creates natural picks vs man coverage. Devastating vs man.
dropback.key_read: LB level - throw to open crosser

dropback.name: Smash
dropback.description: High-low on the corner. Outside hitch, inside corner route. Classic cover 2 beater - attacks the hole.
dropback.key_read: Corner - if sits on hitch, throw corner. If bails, throw hitch.

dropback.name: Curl-Flat
dropback.description: Outside curl at 12 yards, inside flat. Horizontal stretch on flat defender, deeper developing than slant-flat.
dropback.key_read: Flat defender - same as slant-flat but deeper

dropback.name: Flood
dropback.description: 3 receivers to one side at different depths - flat, out, corner. Overloads zone with 3 vs 2.
dropback.key_read: Safety rotation - read high to low

dropback.name: Drive
dropback.description: Dig route at 12-15 yards with drag underneath. Vertical stretch on hook defenders. High-low read.
dropback.key_read: Hook/curl defender - if he drops, throw drag. If he sits, throw dig.

dropback.name: Levels
dropback.description: Dig route with two shorter in-routes at different depths. Creates horizontal and vertical stress.
dropback.key_read: Work high to low - find open level

dropback.name: Shallow Cross
dropback.description: Shallow crossing route from one side, dig from opposite. Hi-lo on zone defenders with crossers going opposite directions.

dropback.name: Spacing
dropback.description: 5 receivers at same depth (~5 yards) spread horizontally. Impossible math for zone - more receivers than defenders.
dropback.key_read: Find the void - throw to open grass

dropback.name: Y-Cross
dropback.description: TE runs deep cross at 15 yards. Outside receivers clear out. Gets athletic TE matched on linebacker.
dropback.key_read: Safety help - throw away from help

dropback.name: Dagger
dropback.description: Slot runs seam/go, outside runs dig behind it. Seam clears the safety, dig comes open underneath.
dropback.key_read: Safety - if bites on seam, throw dig

dropback.name: China
dropback.description: TE runs angle route (out then in), RB runs wheel. Creates traffic and matchup problems.
dropback.key_read: LB covering RB - wheel beats inside leverage

dropback.name: Scissors
dropback.description: Inside receiver runs corner, outside runs post. Routes cross, creating confusion for defenders.
dropback.key_read: Safety leverage - throw away from help

dropback.name: Sail
dropback.description: Deep out at 18 yards with go and flat. 3-level stretch to the sideline, stresses corner.

deep_shots.name: Four Verts
deep_shots.description: 4 receivers run vertical routes. Slots split safeties. Classic cover 2 beater - forces safety to choose.

deep_shots.name: Post-Wheel
deep_shots.description: Deep post with wheel from backfield. Single-high safety must choose which to help on.
deep_shots.key_read: Free safety - throw opposite his movement

deep_shots.name: Mills/Anchor
deep_shots.description: Outside runs post, slot runs dig underneath. Safety bites on dig, post comes open behind.
deep_shots.key_read: Safety - if bites on dig, throw post

deep_shots.name: Double Post
deep_shots.description: Two posts from different releases. Creates traffic in middle of field, hard to defend with single high.
deep_shots.key_read: Safety can't help both - throw open post

deep_shots.name: Post-Corner
deep_shots.description: Outside runs corner, inside runs post. High-low on safety. Puts safety in impossible conflict.

deep_shots.name: Slot Fade
deep_shots.description: Slot receiver runs fade with outside release. Gets speed player on LB or safety mismatch.
deep_shots.key_read: Matchup - throw if slot beats his man

deep_shots.name: Hank
deep_shots.description: Deep comeback at 18 yards paired with go route. Corner must commit - either give up comeback or go.
deep_shots.key_read: Corner - if trails X, throw comeback

play_action.name: PA Boot
play_action.description: Fake inside run, QB boots to opposite flat. TE drags across, outside receiver runs comeback. Classic play action.
play_action.key_read: LB flow - if they bite on run, TE opens

play_action.name: PA Deep Cross
play_action.description: Fake run, deep crossing route. LBs freeze on run fake, crosser runs behind them.
play_action.key_read: LBs - cross opens if they bite

play_action.name: PA Post
play_action.description: Fake run, throw deep post. Safety should bite on run, post runs behind him.
play_action.key_read: Safety - if bites on run, post is open

play_action.name: PA Corner
play_action.description: Fake run, throw corner route. Great against cover 2 - corner bites, safety is late.
play_action.key_read: Corner - run fake should pull him up

play_action.name: PA Flood
play_action.description: Fake run, flood to play side. 3-level stretch - flat, out, corner. Defense flowing to run opens flood.
play_action.key_read: Read high to low after run fake

play_action.name: PA Wheel
play_action.description: Fake run to RB, RB releases on wheel. Linebackers frozen, RB runs past them.
play_action.key_read: LB covering RB - wheel beats man coverage

screens.name: RB Screen
screens.description: Classic running back screen. Let rushers through, throw behind them. OL releases to block downfield.
screens.key_read: DL - let them through, throw behind

screens.name: Tunnel Screen
screens.description: WR screen where inside receivers block, ball to slot. Tunnel created between blockers.

screens.name: Slow Screen
screens.description: Delayed screen to RB. QB holds ball longer, lets rush develop. More time for blockers to get downfield.
screens.key_read: Protection - need time for screen to develop

screens.name: Jailbreak Screen
screens.description: Entire OL releases immediately. Quick throw to RB with wall of blockers in front.

screens.name: Middle Screen
screens.description: Screen up the middle to RB or TE. G and C release to lead block through A gap.

rpo.name: RPO Slant
rpo.description: Inside zone run with slant read. QB reads backside LB - if he flows to run, throw slant behind him.
rpo.key_read: Backside LB - if flows to run, throw slant

rpo.name: RPO Bubble
rpo.description: Inside zone run with bubble read. QB reads flat defender - if he crashes to box, throw bubble.
rpo.key_read: Slot defender - if crashes, throw bubble

rpo.name: RPO Glance
rpo.description: Run with glance/peek route. Receiver runs quick in at 3 yards. QB reads near LB.
rpo.key_read: Playside LB - throw if he steps up

rpo.name: RPO Pop
rpo.description: Run with TE pop pass. TE blocks then releases to flat. QB reads end man on LOS.

rpo.name: RPO Stick
rpo.description: Zone run with stick route. More advanced RPO, gives time for stick to develop.
rpo.key_read: LB - if flows to run, throw stick

run_concepts.name: Inside Zone
run_concepts.description: Base zone run between the tackles. OL takes zone steps, creates combos, climbs to LBs. RB reads blocks and finds the hole - can bang, bend, or bounce.

blocking_rules.LT: Zone step, combo to backside LB

run_concepts.ball_carrier_path: Press A-gap, read first down lineman

run_concepts.name: Outside Zone (Stretch)
run_concepts.description: Zone run designed to get to the edge. OL reach blocks, stretches defense horizontally. RB presses C-gap, can cut back if defense overruns.

run_concepts.name: Power
run_concepts.description: Gap scheme with pulling guard. Playside blocks down, backside guard pulls to kick out EMOL. Physical, downhill running.

run_concepts.name: Counter
run_concepts.description: Misdirection run. RB takes counter step away, then cuts back. Two pullers (G and T) lead to playside. Slow developing but explosive.

run_concepts.name: Duo
run_concepts.description: Power without a puller. Double teams at point of attack, RB reads daylight. Physical, downhill, quick-hitting.

run_concepts.name: Iso
run_concepts.description: Isolation run - FB leads and kicks out LB. Simple, physical. RB follows FB through A-gap.

run_concepts.name: Trap
run_concepts.description: Let DL penetrate, trap him with pulling guard. Works against aggressive, penetrating defenders.

run_concepts.name: Sweep
run_concepts.description: Perimeter run with pulling linemen. G and T pull to lead. Speed play designed to get outside.

run_concepts.name: Toss
run_concepts.description: Pitch play to get outside quickly. QB pitches to RB heading to perimeter. Pullers lead the way.

run_concepts.name: Draw
run_concepts.description: Delayed run. OL shows pass protection, then blocks. RB waits for DL to commit to pass rush.

run_concepts.name: Dive
run_concepts.description: Quick-hitting A-gap run. Fast mesh, immediate handoff. Good for short yardage.

run_concepts.name: QB Draw
run_concepts.description: Draw run for QB. Sell pass, then QB runs. Works against aggressive pass rushers.
run_concepts.ball_carrier_path: QB attacks lane after rushers commit

run_concepts.name: Read Option
run_concepts.description: Zone run with read. QB reads unblocked DE - give to RB if DE crashes, keep if DE stays home.
run_concepts.ball_carrier_path: RB runs zone, QB reads DE

run_concepts.name: Speed Option
run_concepts.description: Perimeter option. QB and RB attack edge, QB reads pitch key. Quick-hitting option to get outside.
run_concepts.ball_carrier_path: Attack edge, pitch if defender takes QB

run_concepts.name: QB Power
run_concepts.description: Power run with QB as ball carrier. Good for mobile QBs near goal line or short yardage.
